anime.description: Short animation by http://anidb.net/cr11207 [Kuri Youji] (久里 洋二), featuring people in cages and silly noises. Along with three other of Kuri short films (one not animated), jointly won the 4th Oofuji Noburou award in 1965 with an http://anidb.net/a7266 [Okamoto Tadanari piece]. More info on Kuri at: http://www.pelleas.net/aniTOP/index.php?p=118 Date of first screening unknown, some time in 1961 or 1962.
